TypeSignature.Value: public interface IPreparedStatement : IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Sql.IStatement

.class public interface auto ansi abstract IPreparedStatement implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Sql.IStatement, class Java.Sql.IWrapper, class System.IDisposable
type IPreparedStatement = interface interface IStatement interface IWrapper interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable interface IJavaPeerable

Docs.summary: An object that represents a precompiled SQL statement.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Execute ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Execute() cil managed
abstract member Execute : unit -> bool

Docs.summary: Executes the SQL statement in this PreparedStatement object, which may be any kind of SQL statement.
Docs.returns: true if the first result is a ResultSet object; false if the first result is an update count or there is no result

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public Java.Sql.IResultSet? ExecuteQuery ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Sql.IResultSet ExecuteQuery() cil managed
abstract member ExecuteQuery : unit -> Java.Sql.IResultSet

Docs.summary: Executes the SQL query in this PreparedStatement object and returns the ResultSet object generated by the query.
Docs.returns: a ResultSet object that contains the data produced by the query; never null

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if a database error happens or if the SQL statement does not produce a ResultSet.

MemberSignature.Value: public int ExecuteUpdate ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 ExecuteUpdate() cil managed
abstract member ExecuteUpdate : unit -> int

Docs.summary: Executes the SQL statement in this PreparedStatement object, which must be an SQL Data Manipulation Language (DML) statement, such as INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE; or an SQL statement that returns nothing, such as a DDL statement.
Docs.returns: either (1) the row count for SQL Data Manipulation Language (DML) statements or (2) 0 for SQL statements that return nothing

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if a database error happens or if the SQL statement returns a ResultSet.

.property instance class Java.Sql.IResultSetMetaData MetaData
member this.MetaData : Java.Sql.IResultSetMetaData

Docs.summary: Returns a ResultSetMetaData describing the ResultSet that would be produced by execution of the PreparedStatement.

Docs.exception: if there is a database error.
